API & Javascript

Momento Desktop

Task

Inspired by the google extension Momentum, "Momento Desktop" is an elegant and encouraging desktop with the possibility to customize users' personal preferences (name and focus). As time goes on, the message and the background image will change accordingly.

Two more features have been added: one is local weather information, another is the famous quote.

Built by HTML, CSS, pure JavaScript and openWeatherAPI
